page.title: 05Agriculture Part 1
page.content: { {Dairy Farming }is the most important type locally.Friesian cows are the mos -t common though some Jersey cows are kept.Farms are no longer concentrated round the farm house.Using modern meth -ods and equipment,a few men can run m ore than one farm.The average sized fa rm is 181 acres,the ratio of men to ac reage is 1:61 and the average herd siz ed is 200.Thanks to Common Market rule s the emphasis is gradually changing a nd more{mixed farming}is being introdu ced.Many farmers are now keeping beef cattle calves,goats,sheep,pigs,chicken s and turkeys.One farm rears 20,000 tu rkeys.Charollais and other breeds have been introduced,usually for cross bree ding as they provide the bulk lacking in the Friesians.Most breeding is done by artificial insemination but some br eeding bulls are kept.
